summary: The former World War II Naval captain of PT-73 - now a fun-loving black marketeer - reunites with his crew to battle a bumbling Russian terrorist. Based on the hit 1960s television show.
cast: Tom Arnold|Dean Stockwell|Debra Messing|David Alan Grier|Tim Curry|Ernest Borgnine|Bruce Campbell|French Stewart|Danton Stone|Brian Haley|Henry Cho|Anthony Jesse Cruz|Honorato Magaloni|Guillermo Ríos|Eduardo López Rojas|Tom Ayers|Scott Cleverdon|Robert Schuch|Tommy Chong|Paco Mauri|Juan Rebolledo|Diego Vazquez Lozano|Lucy Moreno|Mineko Mori|Luis Lemus|Alejandro Reyes|Alex Cole|Joe Keyes|Tomás Leal|Luisa Huertas|Joe Minjares|Fima Noveck|Eric Champnella|John Pyper-Ferguson|Anthony Azizi|Bryan Spicer|Erick Avari|James Hong
title: La armada de McHale
